A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I so wanted to like this film\, coming on the back of 7 and rogue one\, which were both decent.  Instead I left the cinema annoyed and quite deflated\, largely I agreed with a colleague of mine\, who felt that the beginning was decent\, the end was also decent enough\, but the middle felt flat with a lot of in-jokes\, over the top cheesiness and "filler" dressed up as a homage to the past films\, at time it was like it had toy placements throughout with the porg.  The originals did indeed have cheesiness\, but not in the same way that this film hammed it up at times.

Storytelling and writing was awful in places with the characters stagnating and not really doing much around the filler that was taking place.

Such potential\, but came to nothing overall I thought
